meanings.definition: To come into possession or ownership of something.
meanings.sent1: She acquires a new book from the library every week.
meanings.sent2: He acquires a rare coin collection at the auction.
meanings.sent3: The cat acquires a new toy and proudly shows it off to the other pets.
meanings.sent4: The student acquires knowledge like a sponge soaking up water.
meanings.sent5: The farmer acquires a bountiful harvest after a season of hard work.

meanings.definition: To gain or obtain something through effort or skill.
meanings.sent1: He acquires new skills by practicing every day.
meanings.sent2: She acquires a promotion at work for her dedication.
meanings.sent3: The magician acquires a rabbit out of thin air during the show.
meanings.sent4: The athlete acquires victory after months of rigorous training.
meanings.sent5: The explorer acquires a map to the hidden treasure, leading to great excitement.
